This technique will summon a large amount of water that will then be used to strike at the opponent in several versatile ways. [[Shizuku]] has been known to transform it into a dragon with a gaping mouth to attack. The water used will be stationary till it is sent offensively toward the opponent.

== Trivia ==
* The Japanese romanisation of this technique has a pun: the "Gorugon" part is also the [[Wikipedia:Gairaigo|Japanese way to pronounce the English word]] "Gorgon". A [[wikipedia:gorgon|gorgon]] is a woman with snakes in place of her hair, and this technique is a reference to the gorgon, as Shizuku summons a sphere of water around her and shoots many serpentine streams of water in multiple directions from the sphere.

[[es:Conjunto de Agua Gorgon]]
[[pl:Suishū Gorugon]]
[[pt-br:Górgona Atacante de Água]]
